Journal Story: Just under 2 months to go until we set off from Boiling Springs on a flip flop thru hike (19th May). Flying in from England on the 17th May. Husband and wife combo (Don Quixote and Chatterbox). Before we come over hoping to hike the Pennine Way in England in April.

Ordered some lightweight gear from Z packs - arc blast, tent, sleeping bag and getting twitchy as it hasn't arrived yet. Know it is in England but stuck with customs and the post office. Hopefully it isn't going to take too long and cost nme too much more to get hold of it.

Relieved and happy that my order from ZPacks has arrived safely. Had to pay a bit of extra to customs but very happy with pack, tent and sleeping bag. Heading off on the Pennine Way on the 4th April to road test all gear (and wife) before the AT in May
